text: I used to love this game it was like the best game ever when I was younger but now they added all these pay to win things and no skill cards like mega knight and evolution witch. Oh my gosh I like this game a lot and it brings back memories but it is so fricking annoying when you try to play for one second and someone just puts down a stupid mega knight with an evo witch behind it. If I had to play this game for an hour and the timer resets every time you see an evo witch or mega knight or even any kind of no skill player, I would probably either be stuck forever or just try to kill myself ( I know that sounds horrible but in that situation, it‚Äôs justified a little bit I guess ) I‚Äôm not even gonna rate it 5 stars to get attention because literally every other review is 5 stars. They are all from like a year ago so they probably are not that accurate. Also new heroes are so annoying so yea. 2 stars because it used to be best ever but now it is pay to win trash (no offense supercell I like clash of clans it is still good)

title: Player since release almost max account truths
text: $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$GAME OF WAR just different gameplay. I‚Äôve uninstalled because the game is not fun and consistent anymore. Don‚Äôt be fooled by download being free. I‚Äôve been playing for 9 years and and seen all stages. My main deck is maxed (lvl 16) and Ive grinded out the most recent update. The month to month meta gets very old. A paid game is cheaper and more fun. To give you a scope of reference of how much it really costs. It‚Äôs 100+$$$ dollars for a single deck of 8 cards to go from level 15-16. Probably 500$+ if you don‚Äôt have level 15. It took me multiple years to even get to 15. Then on top of that they add evos and heros which cost around 15 dollars each. It takes 3 months to unlock 1 evo of your choice for free and that‚Äôs fine. However heros take longer and you can‚Äôt choose. It‚Äôs clear this is any other money grab that you can scroll through this App Store for. It wasn‚Äôt like this all the time but that‚Äôs what it is now. I really loved this game all the way up until this. In November I had over 100 hrs in December maybe 40 now nothing. I know you guys at tencent and supercell love this so here you go. $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

title: Gameplay
text: I have played this game since the beginning. Unfortunately what used to be one of my favorite games to play has now became one I will not be supporting no longer. The core gameplay of this game were quite amazing such fun strategy. Now this has completely removed the gameplay solely relies on the new purchase of ‚ÄúHero‚Äôs‚Äù with these added features it makes the gameplay no longer about strategy and deck building but about what‚Äôs the latest update. Supercell has longly not been listing to the community and its request, instead they are forcing the decline of their game through horrendous changes. I truly hope they can turn it around. Good luck to any free to play player attempting to play this.
